title: Two year old accidentally shoots 12 year old
content:
Metro police say that a woman brought her two kids to her sisters home in Donelson to play.
Police say she had a pistol in the side compartment of her car.
While unloading the kids, police say a two year old got a hold of the gun and shot a 12 year old as he was helping to unload the other kids. The bullet went through his leg and out his groin.
He was taken to Vanderbilt Medical Center with serious injuries, but is expected to live. No charges have been filed as of yet.
